type Post {
  id: ID!
  title: String!
  text: String
  author: Author!
  postedAt: DateTime!
  postType: PostType!
}

type Author {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  posts(filter: PostFilter, page: Paginate): [Post!]!
  friends: Author
}

enum PostType {
  Statement
  Question
  Answer
}

enum PostFunctions {
    alloftext
    anyoftext
    allofterms
    anyofterms
}

enum PostPredicates {
    title
    text
}
